title: 337. Q&AF: Self-Starter Employees, Making Promises To Your Team & Advertising Your Business
itunes:title: 337. Q&AF: Self-Starter Employees, Making Promises To Your Team & Advertising Your Business
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on the best way to build your employees into self-starters, how you should approach making promises to your team, and when's an appropriate time to start paying to advertise your business.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on the best way to build your employees into self-starters, how you should approach making promises to your team, and when's an appropriate time to start paying to advertise your business.
